components.label: Agent Card
components.description: General purpose LLM agent card used for reasoning or orchestration steps.

components.label: Evidence Collector
components.description: Displays evidence gathering progress and allows uploads or triggers.

components.label: Decision Gate
components.description: Represents a human or automated decision point with branching logic.

handlers.description: LLM agent that aligns scope, requirements, and constraints.
LLM agent that describes evidence to collect and validates uploads.
LLM agent focused on inherent/residual risk commentary.

agents.name: Risk Analyst Agent
agents.description: Summarizes inherent/residual risk and suggests mitigation actions.

agents.name: Fraud Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews anomalies and flags fraud cases for escalation.
